text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria megalopus is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania.
text.References: Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. (1998). "Psychotria megalopus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35464A9929918. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35464A9929918.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
